References

   
Module DMXRuntime
Header /Engine/Plugins/VirtualProduction/DMX/DMXEngine/Source/DMXRuntime/Public/Library/DMXEntityFixtureType.h
Include #include "Library/DMXEntityFixtureType.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (BlueprintType, Blueprintable, Meta=(DisplayName="DMX Fixture Type"))  
class UDMXEntityFixtureType : public UDMXEntity

Remarks

Class to describe a type of Fixture. Fixture Patches can be created from Fixture Types (see UDMXEntityFixturePatch::ParentFixtureTypeTemplate).

Variables

  Type Name Description
TSoftClassPtr< AActor > ActorClassToSpawn The Actor Class that is spawned when the DMX Library dropped onto a Level.
bool bExportGeneratedGDTF If checked, generates a new GDTF instead of exporting the imported GDTF.
bool bShowOnlyLatestGDTFModeRevisions If true only shows latest GDTF mode revisions in editor
FDMXFixtureCategory DMXCategory The Category of the Fixture, useful for Filtering
TObjectPtr< UDMXImport > DMXImport DEPRECATED 5.5 - The GDTF from which this Fixture Type was setup.
TSoftObjectPtr< UDMXImportGDTF > GDTFSource The GDTF that initializes this Fixture Type. When changed, reinitializes with data from the GDTF.
TArray< TObjectPtr< UDMXModulator > > InputModulators Modulators applied right before a patch of this type is received.
TArray< FDMXFixtureMode > Modes
